usedBridgeNames.description: Array of bridges used in the route

totalUserTx.description: Total number of transactions for the route.

totalGasFeesInUsd.description: Combined USD gas fees for all transactions in the route.

sender.description: Address of user making the transactions.

serviceTime.description: Estimate of total time in seconds, excluding the transaction time.

approvalTokenAddress.description: Address of token for which approval is required.

txTarget.description: Address to which transaction has to be sent.

chainId.description: Id of chain where transaction has to be sent.

value.description: Native token amount to be sent with transaction.

totalUserTx.description: Total number of transactions in Active Route.

sourceTxStatus.description: Status of source transaction while bridging.

destinationTxStatus.description: Status of destination transaction while bridging.

serviceTime.description: Approx time for bridging in seconds.

icon.description: URL for icon of gas token.

minNativeCurrencyForGas.description: Minimum amount to be left for gas while using max amount.

isL1.description: Flag indicating whether the chain is L1.

sendingEnabled.description: Flag indicating whether sending of tokens is supported from chain.

receivingEnabled.description: Flag indicating whether receiving of tokens is supported to chain.

includeFirstTxDetails.description:
Include the tx details for the first user transaction. If true it will return the txData txType etc.
If false, it will only return the active route Id of the selected route.

route.description: Selected route by the user to bridge tokens from one chain to another.

userAddress.description: Address of user doing the Active Route.

totalUserTx.description: Total number of txs required in Active Route.

fromAssetAddress.description: Address of token on source chain.

toAssetAddress.description: Address of token on destination chain.

currentUserTxIndex.description: Index of current tx in userTxs array.

txTarget.description: Address to which transaction has to be sent.

chainId.description: Id of chain where transaction has to be sent.

value.description: Native token amount to be sent with transaction.

userTxIndex.description: Index of transaction in Active Route. Index of the object in the userTxs array.

totalUserTx.description: Total number of transactions in Active Route.

200.description: Current gas prices for a chain

parameters.description: ID of chain, e.g Ethereum Mainnet = 1

parameters.description: ID of destination chain, e.g Ethereum Mainnet = 1

parameters.name: bridgeName
parameters.description: Name of the bridge used while bridging.

parameters.name: transactionHash
parameters.description: Transaction hash originating from the source chain while bridging assets.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: ID of source chain, e.g Ethereum Mainnet = 1

200.description: Returns the receipt of the transaction.

parameters.name: chainID
parameters.description: ID of chain, e.g Ethereum Mainnet = 1

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: Wallet address of token holder

parameters.name: allowanceTarget
parameters.description: Address whose spending allowance is to be checked

parameters.name: tokenAddress

200.description: Gives approval values of given tokens for a given owner & chainId

parameters.name: chainID
parameters.description: ID of chain, e.g Ethereum Mainnet = 1

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: Wallet address of token holder

parameters.name: allowanceTarget
parameters.description: Address whose spending allowance is to be checked

parameters.name: tokenAddress
parameters.description: Contract address of token

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Amount of tokens to approve, e.g 10 USDC (6 decimals)

200.description: Return the Approval Tx Data for the given params.

parameters.name: fromChainId
parameters.description: Chain id of source chain.

parameters.name: fromTokenAddress
parameters.description: Token address on source chain.

parameters.name: toChainId
parameters.description: Chain id of destination chain.

parameters.name: toTokenAddress
parameters.description: Token address on destination chain.

parameters.name: fromAmount
parameters.description: Amount of sending tokens.

parameters.name: userAddress
parameters.description: Address of user. This will be used to check approvals.

parameters.name: uniqueRoutesPerBridge
parameters.description: Flag to return only best route per bridge using the sort criteria

parameters.name: disableSwapping
parameters.description: Flag to specify if routes that have dex swap should be ignored.

parameters.name: includeDexes
parameters.description: Specify Dexes that should be included in routes.

parameters.name: excludeDexes
parameters.description:
Specify Dexes that should be excluded in routes.
This option will be ignored if includeDexes is specified.

parameters.name: includeBridges
parameters.description: Specify Bridges that should be included in routes.

parameters.name: excludeBridges
parameters.description:
Specify Bridges that should be excluded in routes.
This option will be ignored if includeBridges is specified.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Param to sort routes based on.

parameters.name: maxUserTxs
parameters.description:
Maximum number of transactions.
This option will be ignored if singleTxOnly is marked as true.

parameters.name: singleTxOnly
parameters.description: Only get quotes with one user transaction to bridge.

200.description: Returns all the possible routes for bridging tokens from one chain to another. One of the routes can be selected and passed in to start the route.
All Supported Bridges
All Supported Chains by Movr
Returns the balance of all tokens for a user address on all supported chains

parameters.name: tokenAddress
parameters.description: Token contract address on network, e.g USDC on Ethereum Mainnet

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: ID of chain, e.g Ethereum Mainnet = 1

parameters.name: userAddress
parameters.description: Address of the user

200.description: Returns the balance of the token on any given chain

post.description:
Function that takes in a route and starts the selected route.
  Function is responsible for
  - Saving the selected route to bridge tokens from one chain to another.
  - Saving the fromChain, toChain, and fromAsssetAddress and toAssetAddress
  - Returns the Active Route Id, Current Tx, Total number of txs, txType

200.description: Starts the Active Route and gives back the data to start the route

parameters.name: activeRouteId
parameters.description: Id of the Active Route.

200.description: Get active route details using active route id

parameters.name: userAddress
parameters.description: Address of user starting the route.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort param for routes.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset for fetching active routes.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of active routes to return in one API call.

parameters.name: routeStatus
parameters.description: Status of the route. The route will only be marked completed if all the user txs have been completed.

parameters.name: fromChainId
parameters.description: Id of sending chain

parameters.name: toChainId
parameters.description: Id of destination chain.

parameters.name: fromTokenAddress
parameters.description: Address of token on source chain.

parameters.name: toTokenAddress
parameters.description: Token address on destination chain.

200.description: Get all the active routes from a user address. Filters like fromChainId, toChainId and token addresses can be used to get back specific active routes.

parameters.name: activeRouteId
parameters.description: Id of Active Route.

200.description: Get next tx details of an active route

parameters.name: activeRouteId
parameters.description: Id of Active Route.

parameters.name: userTxIndex
parameters.description: Index of the userTxs in the Active Route. Every active route will have a userTxs array. userTxIndex is the index of the object in the userTxs array.

parameters.name: txHash
parameters.description: Transaction hash that relates to the userTxIndex. Each object in the userTxs is a transaction that has to be done by the user to progress in the route. If all the transactions are completed in the route, it will be marked complete.

parameters.name: signature
parameters.description: Signature to be sent in case the next transaction is dependant on the signature.

200.description: Get status of an active route

parameters.name: fromChainId
parameters.description: Id of source chain, e.g Optimism = 10

parameters.name: toChainId
parameters.description: Id of destination chain, e.g xDAI = 100

parameters.name: disableSwapping
parameters.description: Flag to specify if tokens that need dex swap should be ignored.

parameters.name: includeDexes
parameters.description: Specify Dexes that should be included for token support.

parameters.name: excludeDexes
parameters.description:
Specify Dexes that should be excluded for token support.
This option will be ignored if includeDexes is specified.

parameters.name: includeBridges
parameters.description: Specify Bridges that should be included for token support.

parameters.name: excludeBridges
parameters.description:
Specify Bridges that should be excluded for token support.
This option will be ignored if includeBridges is specified.

parameters.name: singleTxOnly
parameters.description: To be Marked true if you want the token list that needs only a single transaction from the user to bridge.

200.description: All Supported token by a given chainId

Flag to specify if tokens that need dex swap should be ignored.
This option will be ignored if singleTxOnly is marked true.

Specify Bridges that should be excluded for token support.
